page.title: 18INDUSTRY WITHIN THE REGION
page.content: THE MOST IMPORTANT INDUSTRY IS FARMING, COVERING MOST OF THE LAND AND EMPLOYING MANY OF THE LOCAL WORK FORCE. THE IS A CONSIDERABLE AMOUNT OF LIGHT ENGINEERING. ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT ENGINEERING FIRMS BEING SMITH AND SONS, WHO ARE COACH BUILDERS,EQUIPING AND PREPARING A WIDE RANGE OF SPECIALIST VEHICLES. BUILDING AND RELATED BUILDING SERVICES ARE ANOTHER IMPORTANT BUSINESS CONCERN WITHIN GREAT BENTLEY. THE LOCAL JOINERY FIRM BEING AN IMPORTANT PART OF THIS. THERE ARE SEVERAL FIRMS INVOLVED IN THE MOTOR TRADE, PROVIDING A COMPREHENSIVE RANGE OF SERVICES FROM PANEL BEATING TO SERVICING CARS. PLASTIC MOULDINGS FOR GIFT WRAPPINGS ARE MANUFACTURED IN THE VILLAGE. THERE IS A FIRM MAKING VENDING MACHINES FOR HOT DRINKS.
